articles.author: Jihye Lee, Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: Japan's Topix slides 2% in Asia's sell-off over Silicon Valley Bank concerns - CNBC
articles.description: Asia markets tumbled in a volatile session, continuing sharp losses seen on Wall Street as investors grapple with the fallout of failed banks in the U.S., including Silicon Valley Bank.
articles.content: Asia-Pacific markets tumbled on Tuesday in a volatile session, after sharp losses seen overnight on Wall Street as investors grappled with the fallout of failed banks in the U.S., including Silicon V… [+1023 chars]

articles.title: Michelle Yeoh's Mom IN TEARS Reacting to Daughter Winning an Oscar - Entertainment Tonight
